channel.title: MoparScape Clan Community
channel.description:
A friend and I were thinking about an idea we could do here. I think it sounds like fun and a good idea.
So the idea is that we create a MoparScape clan community, with a certain number of clans with certain requirements etc. Anyone can start a clan, and if it gets approved it will get posted in this post to be made official. So here are some examples.
[b][u]The Mopar Clan (F2P & P2P)[/u][/b] No requirements to join this clan! [b]Owner:[/b] David [b]Ranked Members[/b]
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Members:[/b]
[ul][li]Krackkid[/li] [li]CoonHunter[/li] [li]pure2ownage[/li] [li]noobs are FTW[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b][u]The Combat Club (F2P & P2P)[/u][/b] To be in this club you need at least combat level 100, or 99 range or mage. [b]Owner:[/b] (to be found) [b]Ranked Members[/b]
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Members:[/b]
[ul][li]pure2ownage[/li] [li]Davidi2[/li][/ul]
[b][u]The 99 Clan (F2P & P2P)[/u][/b] To be in this club you need at least one 99 skill, without using any potions or effects. [b]Owner:[/b] (to be found) [b]Ranked Members[/b]
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Members:[/b]
[ul][li]Davidi2[/li] [li]pure2ownage[/li][/ul]
Post your own clan and see if it gets accepted!

item.title: MoparScape Clan Community
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:54, topic:355239”]Combat club then.[/quote]Naw I changed my mind, you can be in more than one.

[quote=“Berky-Scape, post:55, topic:355239”]Meh,: Hig Golem, cblvl 100, F2P.[/quote]And which clan(s) do you want to join?

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:56, topic:355239”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=451800.msg3329352#msg3329352 date=1283364008]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451800.msg3329340#msg3329340 date=1283362975]
Was no relevance in quoting the OP dude.
[/quote]Who are you talking to?

EDIT - [quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=451800.msg3329217#msg3329217 date=1283353022]
add me to list rs ftl o_0
[/quote]Which one?

waiting to be added to all lists…
[/quote]You want to be on all of them? Please try and choose one…

Also - Remember, you can make your own clan, and I will post it. And I’m also looking for some owners for the other clans!

Lets use my noob account for teh Owner (of MPSC clan.) Ill set it up and stuff if accepted.

Soharuda1388[/quote]I’m the owner of the MPSC clan.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Clan Community
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“object, post:40, topic:355239”]I made an account for the event that Miss Silabsoft mentioned, called Jaghax[1-9] (where [1-9] refers to a particular number between 1 (inclusive) and 9 (inclusive), that I currently cannot remember). I never had time to participate in the event when it was, but my account was permanently banned anyway. This means I personally never broke any rules within the game itself, but was still punished. So I assume this could happen to anyone else aswell - if they are in some way affiliated with a site such as this one, that is.[/quote]That sucks, how long ago was this?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Clan Community
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

I made an account for the event that Miss Silabsoft mentioned, called Jaghax[1-9] (where [1-9] refers to a particular number between 1 (inclusive) and 9 (inclusive), that I currently cannot remember). I never had time to participate in the event when it was, but my account was permanently banned anyway. This means I personally never broke any rules within the game itself, but was still punished. So I assume this could happen to anyone else aswell - if they are in some way affiliated with a site such as this one, that is.

Read full topic

For the squeamish, you can just PM me your username, I will verify it, and then add your forum username to the list.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Clan Community
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

m.dog311:

I’m sure JaGEx keeps a close eye on this site, TOS or not. Which is why most people don’t enjoy putting their names in screen shots and what not. JaGEx sees this thread, sees the clan names on here, starts searching through clan chats to find names that might match up on here. And you know how the rest goes

I have posted pictures of my account…party hats on…saying I hacked it all and bought it…name not blocked out.

Still going strong

Trust me, Jagex has given up on this site.

Read full topic

That’s the automated reply… I mean the part where it says ‘reason’, in like the evidence part

None.

item.title: MoparScape Clan Community
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:34, topic:355239”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451800.msg3312742#msg3312742 date=1282085594]

[quote author=T3arful link=topic=451800.msg3312663#msg3312663 date=1282081818][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451800.msg3312574#msg3312574 date=1282079436]
Just thought about something. How can they prove the account name you are putting, is really you? Not like they can order MITB to give them the IP’s for each user.
[/quote]
They won’t ban you for simply putting your name out there, but if they see you doing something on Runescape that is in any way related to Runescape Emulation they will punish you. Example: if you put your rs name on this thread and then they saw the said rs name in the Moparscape clan chat, they will then take action because it’s sufficient evidence for them.
[/quote]
This why i was saying, how can they prove, that the accounts we name here, are really us.
[/quote]
Doesn’t matter. I could ban you because I think you’re Telenim. The only difference between our bans and theirs is that we actually listen to people’s appeals sometimes.

And Davidi2, please, tell me. How do you know that wont do?[/quote]
Eeh, thus the reason I had already asked to be removed from teh list

Read full topic
